attributes.action: EU citizens with settled status in the UK to be entitled to FULL voting rights
attributes.additional_details: There are many EU citizens living and working and paying taxes in the UK, who have made their lives here. There should be NO taxation without representation. That is incompatible with any notion of democracy, The MUST be accorded full voting rights here.
attributes.background: Make it law that ALL EU citizens with settled status in the UK are entitled to FULL voting rights in ALL UK elections.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

'Allow EU citizens with settled status to vote in UK general elections'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648880
